mapper.select: select t.theater_no as theaterNo, t.theater_name as theaterName, r.region_no as regionNo, r.region_name as regionName, sc.screen_no as screenNo, show.show_schedule_no as showScheduleNo, show.movie_no as movieNo from theater t, region r, screen sc, show_schedule show where t.region_no = r.region_no and sc.theater_no = t.theater_no and show.screen_no = sc.screen_no and movie_no = #{value}
select count(*) as total from region r, theater t where r.region_no = t.region_no and r.region_no = #{value}

select t.theater_no as theaterNo, t.theater_name as theaterName, r.region_no as regionNo, r.region_name as regionName, sc.screen_no as screenNo, sc.screen_name as screenName, show.movie_no as movieNo, sc.screen_total_seat as screenTotalSeat, show.show_schedule_start_time as showScheduleStartTime, show.show_schedule_end_time as showScheduleEndTime, mr.movie_rating_no as movieRatingNo, mr.movie_rating_name as movieRatingName, m.movie_name as movieName, st.show_type_no as showTypeNo, st.show_type_name as showTypeName, st.show_type_subtitle as showTypeSubTitle from theater t, region r, screen sc, show_schedule show, movie m, movie_rating mr, show_type st where t.region_no = r.region_no and sc.theater_no = t.theater_no and show.screen_no = sc.screen_no and show.movie_no = m.movie_no and m.movie_rating_no = mr.movie_rating_no and show.show_type_no = st.show_type_no and show.movie_no = #{movieNo} and t.theater_no = #{theaterNo}

select s.special_screen_no as specialScreenNo, s.special_screen_name as specialScreenName, t.theater_no as theaterNo, t.theater_name as theaterName, r.region_no as regionNo, r.region_name as regionName, sc.screen_no as screenNo, sc.screen_name as screenName, show.movie_no as movieNo, sc.screen_total_seat as screenTotalSeat, show.show_schedule_start_time as showScheduleStartTime, show.show_schedule_end_time as showScheduleEndTime, mr.movie_rating_no as movieRatingNo, mr.movie_rating_name as movieRatingName, m.movie_name as movieName, st.show_type_no as showTypeNo, st.show_type_name as showTypeName, st.show_type_subtitle as showTypeSubTitle from special_screen s, theater t, region r, screen sc, show_schedule show, movie m, movie_rating mr, show_type st where s.special_screen_no = sc.special_screen_no and t.region_no = r.region_no and sc.theater_no = t.theater_no and show.screen_no = sc.screen_no and show.movie_no = m.movie_no and m.movie_rating_no = mr.movie_rating_no and show.show_type_no = st.show_type_no and show.movie_no = #{movieNo} and s.special_no = #{specialNo}
